appName.message: Korean Word Lookup - Hover & Select Translate

appDesc.message: Korean translator & dictionary: hover words for definitions, or select sentences to translate instantly.

apiKeyPlaceholder.message: Paste your key to override the default

statusHover.message: Hover over Korean text to see English definitions

reviewText.message: A quick rating helps more Korean learners find this extension.

footerData.message: Dictionary data provided by National Institute of Korean Language's Basic Korean Dictionary

footerLicense.message: This extension is distributed under CC BY-SA 2.0 KR License

footerContact.message: If you have any suggestions or problems, please contact:

optAutoFallbackDesc.message: Automatically try another source if not found

welcomeSubtitle.message: Thank you for installing Korean Word Lookup. Here's how to get started.

refreshNotice.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è If the extension is not working properly, please press F5 to refresh the page!

feat1.message: Hover over Korean words to see their English translations or definitions

feat2.message: Choose between Google Translate and Korean Dictionary

featAutoFallback.message: Auto-Fallback: Automatically switches to Google Translate if dictionary lookup fails

feat5.message: Use keyboard shortcuts for quick access to features

feat6.message: Customize hover delay, tooltip size, and definition depth from the popup

feat7.message: Select Korean sentences to translate them instantly

start1.message: Click the extension icon in your browser toolbar

start2.message: Pin the extension to see whether extension is enabled

start3.message: Make sure translation is enabled (toggle switch is on)

start5.message: Hover over any Korean text to see its translation!

credits1.message: This extension uses two translation sources:

credits3.message: Provided by National Institute of Korean Language's Basic Korean Dictionary

credits4.message: Offers detailed word definitions and examples
